class.name: CylinderShape3D
class.brief_description: A 3D cylinder shape used for physics collision.
class.description: A 3D cylinder shape, intended for use in physics. Usually used to provide a shape for a [CollisionShape3D]. [b]Note:[/b] There are several known bugs with cylinder collision shapes. Using [CapsuleShape3D] or [BoxShape3D] instead is recommended. [b]Performance:[/b] [CylinderShape3D] is fast to check collisions against, but it is slower than [CapsuleShape3D], [BoxShape3D], and [SphereShape3D].
